title: Random Quote Machine
body: Building a custom multisite compatible WordPress plugin to build global search with Algolia

title: Markdown Previewer
body: A single page web app for helping me choose where to travel, built with Next.js, Firebase, and Tailwind CSS

title: Drum Machine
body: Find out how we built a custom headless CMS with Node, Express, and Firebase for a project at Upstatement

title: JavaScript Calculator
body: A simple Google Keep clone built with Vue and Firebase.

title: 25 + 5 Clock
body: Embeddable web player widget for Apple Music that lets users log in and listen to full song playback in the browser leveraging MusicKit.js. Read more about this project on 9to5Mac.

title: IMDb Clone
body: Facebook Messenger chat bot extension featuring authentication and full song streaming from within the Messenger app. Read more about it on The Verge.
